item.title: Conifer trees obscuring traffic lights, 21st April
item.description:

item.title: Road marking danger to traffic, 21st April
item.description:
During works on the new cycleway the driving line down Evesham Road at the entrance to Walnut Close has been shifted to the left; cars exiting Walnut Close and stopping at the give-way line are now in the middle of the Evesham Road south driving line. Those of us living in Walnut Close are getting used to this, but visitors, delivery drivers, and users of Pittville Park who park in Walnut Close are stopping at the give-way sign and soon there will be an accident. A stop line needs to be painted on the junction at a suitable point.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Walnut Close, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pothole & deformations, 21st April
item.description:
